00104 Array< double > invert( const Array< double >& A )
00105 {
00106     SIZE_CHECK( A.ndim( ) == 2 )
00107 
00108     Array< double > B( A.dim( 1 ), A.dim( 0 ) );
00109     Array2DReference< double > amatL( const_cast< Array< double >& >( A ) );
00110     Array2DReference< double > bmatL( B );
00111 
00112     g_inverse( amatL, bmatL );
00113 
00114     return Array< double >( B, true );
00115 }
